import React, {Component} from "react"; import AccessibilityIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Accessibility'; import styles from "./MainStyle.css"; import ChangingButtons from "./ChangingButtons"; import MapContainer from '../../MapContainerView' class EventComponent extends Component{ render(){ return(

{this.props.header}

{this.props.currentPeople} / {this.props.maxPeople}

Start Date: {this.props.startDate}

End Date: {this.props.startDate}

) } } export default EventComponent;
